hero.title: Transform Your Beauty at Dr. Pedro's MedSpa
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive aesthetic treatments combining advanced technology with artistic expertise
hero.description: Experience the ultimate in aesthetic excellence with our full range of cosmetic treatments. From Botox and fillers to body contouring and facial rejuvenation, discover your most confident self.

doctor.name: Dr. Gregory Pedro, DMD
doctor.title: Aesthetic Medicine Specialist
doctor.description: Dr. Pedro combines his expertise in facial anatomy with advanced aesthetic techniques to deliver natural, beautiful results.

treatments.name: Botox & Dysport
treatments.description: Smooth away wrinkles and fine lines with FDA-approved neurotoxins for a refreshed, youthful appearance.

treatments.name: Dermal Fillers
treatments.description: Restore volume and enhance facial contours with premium hyaluronic acid fillers.

treatments.name: EMFACE Treatment
treatments.description: Non-invasive facial muscle toning and skin tightening for a natural facelift effect.

treatments.name: Opus Plasma
treatments.description: Advanced plasma technology for skin resurfacing and rejuvenation.

treatments.name: Professional Teeth Whitening
treatments.description: Brighten your smile with professional-grade whitening treatments.

treatments.name: Treatment Combinations
treatments.description: Custom packages combining multiple treatments for comprehensive aesthetic enhancement.

packages.name: Complete Rejuvenation
packages.description: Our most comprehensive package for total facial rejuvenation

packages.name: Volume & Glow
packages.description: Restore volume and achieve radiant skin

financing.title: Flexible Financing Options
financing.description: Make your aesthetic dreams affordable with our financing partners

options.description: Healthcare financing with flexible payment options
Work with our team for personalized payment solutions

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.comment: Dr. Pedro is an outstanding dentist. I have a very difficult bite and needed a new bridge. Other dentists did not want to tryâ€“ with time and expertise, Dr. Pedro succeeded in creating a perfect bridge! He has successfully branched into the field of aesthetics. I tried the deep moisturizing machine and received myriad compliments after the first treatment! I have also tried the Opus plasma treatment and my skin feels wonderful!!

testimonials.name: Jennifer K.
testimonials.comment: Dr Pedro, displays an easygoing attitude, attentively listens to your problems and offers solutions in easy to understand language all while maintaining a professional attitude. Marie at the desk shows the same qualities. Both exude warmth, understanding, and professionalism. I am very happy to have been introduced to Dr. Pedro and his practice.
